channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Qodo teams up with Google Cloud, to provide devs with FREE AI code review tools directly within platform
item.description: The goal is to make enterprise-grade code quality solutions accessible to fast-growing startups looking to scale responsibly.

item.title: Netflix is setting its sights on the theme-park world, after already taking over TV
item.description: Netflix is moving into the theme-park space with the opening of Netflix House in Philadelphia and Dallas later this year.

item.title: This one-and-done heart-disease treatment just got a $1.3 billion endorsement from Eli Lilly
item.description: Verve Therapeutics’ stock was rallying by a record 80% on Eli Lilly’s premium purchase price for the drug-development company.

item.title: How to create a traditional pension — right now
item.description: Annuities are a better deal now than even a few years ago. So why aren’t people buying them?

item.title: ANYbotics launches Gas Leak and Presence Detection for ANYmal inspection robot
item.description: ANYbotics has integrated gas detectors and an acoustic imaging payload with its modular offerings for customizable inspections. The post ANYbotics lau...

item.title: Cutting cloud waste at scale: Akamai saves 70% using AI agents orchestrated by kubernetes
item.description: Akamai needed a Kubernetes automation platform that optimized the costs of running its core infrastructure in real time on several clouds.

item.title: My mother-in-law, 95, has $400K in stocks. Would it be smarter taxwise to gift it to her kids — or leave it to them in her will?
item.description: “What is the smartest way to go about this? Will she be taxed?”

item.title: Bye-bye bidding wars: Housing market becomes more buyer-friendly as more sellers slash prices
item.description: For-sale listings are piling up in many real-estate markets in the U.S., according to data from Realtor.com.

item.title: The Download: power in Puerto Rico, and the pitfalls of AI agents
item.description: This is today’s edition of The Download, our weekday newsletter that provides a daily dose of what’s going on in the world of technology. Puerto Rico’...

item.title: MiniMax-M1 is a new open source model with 1 MILLION TOKEN context and new, hyper efficient reinforcement learning
item.description: MiniMax-M1 presents a flexible option for organizations looking to experiment with or scale up advanced AI capabilities while managing costs.

item.title: Inside LinkedIn’s AI overhaul: Job search powered by LLM distillation
item.description: In building its AI-powered job search, now available to all users, LinkedIn chose to distill large models and improve its understanding of queries.
